net.realmproject.dcm.event.bus

Class IDeviceEventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.realmproject.dcm.event.IDeviceEventNode
      • net.realmproject.dcm.event.relay.AbstractDeviceEventRelay
        • net.realmproject.dcm.event.bus.IDeviceEventBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceEventBus, DeviceEventNode, Identity, Logging, DeviceEventReceiver, DeviceEventRelay

    public class IDeviceEventBus
extends AbstractDeviceEventRelay
implements DeviceEventBus, Logging
    Implementation of DeviceEventBus. Broadcasting events is done on a single (separate) thread in order of receipt.
    Author:
    NAS

                            java.util.function.Consumer<DeviceEvent> subscriber)
        Description copied from interface: DeviceEventBus
        Listen for events broadcast on this event bus. Only events accepted by the given filter will be sent to this subscriber.
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface DeviceEventBus
        Parameters:
        filter - rule for which events to listen for
        subscriber - the consumer of events

      • getZone

        public java.lang.String getZone()
        Description copied from interface: DeviceEventBus
        Gets the zone for this this DeviceEventBus. Larger or more complex collections of devices can be split up into zones. Events can be filtered by zone to isolate certain devices, or to keep the number of events to a minimum
        Specified by:
        getZone in interface DeviceEventBus
        Returns:
        the zone of this bus

      • setZone

        public void setZone(java.lang.String zone)
        Description copied from interface: DeviceEventBus
        Sets the zone for this this DeviceEventBus. Larger or more complex collections of devices can be split up into zones. Events can be filtered by zone to isolate certain devices, or to keep the number of events to a minimum
        Specified by:
        setZone in interface DeviceEventBus
        Parameters:
